title: Number of stores of Sears Holdings worldwide 2009 to 2017

Sears Holdings stores Sears Holdings origins stores Sears Holdings , headquartered in New Jersey , operates over 200 subsidiary companies in 60 countries within the pharmaceutical , medical devices and consumer healthcare segments .
